name: haitihospital
description: This is a web application made for Hope Health Action (HHA) with the goal to digitize its data collection process at field hospitals. The project uses the MERN stack and is based on a [boiler plate](https://github.com/nemanjam/mern-boilerplate).

scripts.setup: npm install --prefix common && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client & npm run build --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix client; npm run test --prefix server; npm run test --prefix common
scripts.dev: npm run server & npm run client
